npcText: He seems to be a child not over the age of eight, with ash and soot covering him from head to toe.
Timmy: 7 ! I just started school this year.
Timmy: Somersby. Down near Fort Knight.

playerText: Would you like a towel to clean up ?
npcText: Timmy: No thanks, I've tried but it won't come off.
Timmy: Well I haven't been in a while. 's alright though ! I don't like homework.
Timmy: I haven't seen Daddy since the army men took him away. Mummy went to look for him when we didn't get letters back ?
Dunno ! I remember hearing a whistling noise in the barn, then a big boom and I blacked out. My sister Tammy probably brought me here. Have you seen her ?

playerText: I'll keep an eye out for her

npcText: It's a farming area ! We used to have really big apple orchards. Most of them burned down though.
I got caught in a barn fire after the bombs fell. I'm alright now though ! This train is very nice
Press anywhere after clipping to confirm.
